about_the_game:
This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.
The game continues the game setting and gameplay of Sufferer Rescue Center 1.
The story of the new game tells that the protagonist Zhang Ji went bankrupt after another failed mission. In order to pay the rent to make ends meet, he had to go to a convenience store to work. But when I went there, I found that only I was on duty at night in the convenience store. It turns out that the guests who come at night can be said to be strange and even haunted, and the new stories in the game are staged among these guests.
The game adopts dynamic comic performances, with rich pictures and simple gameplay, combined with mini-games to solve puzzles, the overall story plot is humorous and contains many popular hot spots. If you are familiar with Internet culture, you will like this series of works more.
Loading the secondary DLC can unlock more side missions, and playing the game normally can unlock other character exposure resources
